Summary: 4 red fast moving objects following one yellow one.
divs: sighting detailsit was 10:30 pm,and i usually walk around outside aimlessly outside my house. i looked north towards 29 palms military base and farther towards the direction of area 51 suprisingly. what i saw blew my mind it was 4 things flying fast following 1 yellow thing. at first i thought it was military jets (maybe who knows). but they were zipping all over the place, there was dim yellow light 4 of the red ones were following i tried to recreate the scienario in adobe flash (poorly) contact me a [cms\tg\pid]
